Detailed Description

Keeps track of the set of mixture options in a convenient way.

Also, enforces the default options so that a user will not have to set any options unless they wish to change from the default behavior.

Definition at line 58 of file MixtureOptions.h.

◆ MixtureOptions() [3/5]

MixtureOptions ( const std::string &  mixture)

Constructs a new MixtureOptions object from a mixture file (without the .xml extension).

The file is first assumed to reside in the relative path from the local directory. If it does not exist there, then MPP_DATA_DIRECTORY/mixtures is checked.

Definition at line 62 of file MixtureOptions.cpp.

Constructs a new MixtureOptions object from a mixture file (without the .xml extension).

The file is first assumed to reside in the relative path from the local directory. If it does not exist there, then MPP_DATA_DIRECTORY/mixtures is checked.

Definition at line 187 of file MixtureOptions.h.

◆ hasDefaultComposition()

bool hasDefaultComposition ( ) const
inline

Returns true if a default composition has been set either in a mixture file or explicitly by the user.

Otherwise, using getDefaultComposition() is meaningless.
